description: This table stores information about front-end collection actions taken through point of sale (POS) payment posting or refund workflows.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: COLL_INSTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that this event occurred.

columns.name: COLL_WORKFLOW_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The workflow in which this event took place.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Registration


Pre-Admission


Admission


Discharge


Sign-In


Check-In


Check-Out


Update Admission


Update Discharge


HOV


Scheduling Registration


L&D Assessment


L&D Update Admission


ED Update Admission


Newborn Admission


Newborn Update Admission


ED Admission


ED Discharge

columns.name: LOGIN_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department which a user was logged into at the time of this event.

columns.name: ENC_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the encounter department associated with this event.

columns.name: RSN_NON_COLL_AMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The non-collection reason category ID for this event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other (Requires Comment)


Unable to Pay


Refused To Pay


Payment Processing Error


Disputed Amount


Needed Urgent Care


Eligibility Issue


Financial Assistance


Requested Bill


Unavailable for Payment


Has Secondary Insurance


Waived Amount

columns.name: RSN_NON_COLL_AMT_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text non-collection comment explaining why some portion of a due amount was not collected.

columns.name: GUARANTOR_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor who is associated with this event.

columns.name: EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The event type category ID that defines the type of payment event data that is stored in this row.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Collection Event


Reason Storage Line


Give-Back


Reversal


Visit Auto Pay Cancellation

columns.name: PB_COPAY_COLL
columns.description: The amount of professional billing copay that a user collected during this event.

columns.name: PB_COPAY_PAID
columns.description: The amount of professional billing copay that had already been paid towards an encounter at the time of this event.

columns.name: PB_COPAY_DUE
columns.description: The total amount of professional billing copay that is required for this visit at the time of this event.

columns.name: HB_COPAY_COLL
columns.description: The amount of hospital billing copay that a user collected during this event.

columns.name: HB_COPAY_PAID
columns.description: The amount of hospital billing copay that had already been paid towards an encounter at the time of this event.

columns.name: HB_COPAY_DUE
columns.description: The total amount of hospital billing copay that is required for this visit at the time of this event.

columns.name: PB_PREPAY_COLL
columns.description: The amount of professional billing prepayment that a user collected.

columns.name: PB_PREPAY_PAID
columns.description: The amount of professional billing prepayment that had already been paid towards an encounter at the time of this event.

columns.name: PB_PREPAY_DUE
columns.description: The total amount of professional billing prepayment that is required for this visit at the time of this event.

columns.name: HB_PREPAY_COLL
columns.description: The amount of hospital billing prepayment that a user collected during this event.

columns.name: HB_PREPAY_PAID
columns.description: The amount of hospital billing prepayment that had already been paid towards an encounter at the time of this event.

columns.name: HB_PREPAY_DUE
columns.description: The total amount of hospital billing prepayment that is required for this visit at the time of this event.

columns.name: PB_PREV_BAL_COLL
columns.description: The amount of professional billing previous balance that a user collected during this event.

columns.name: PB_PREV_BAL_PAID
columns.description: The amount of professional billing previous balance that had already been paid towards this guarantor's outstanding balance during the day of this event.

columns.name: PB_PREV_BAL_DUE
columns.description: The amount of self-pay professional billing outstanding balance that a guarantor owed at the time of this event.

columns.name: HB_PREV_BAL_COLL
columns.description: The amount of hospital billing previous balance that a user collected during this event.

columns.name: HB_PREV_BAL_PAID
columns.description: The amount of hospital billing previous balance that had already been paid towards this guarantor's outstanding balance during the day of this event.

columns.name: HB_PREV_BAL_DUE
columns.description: The amount of self-pay hospital billing outstanding balance that a guarantor owed at the time of this event.

columns.name: PREPAY_DISCOUNT_OFFERED
columns.description: The total amount of the prepay discount that was offered for this visit at the time of this event.
